channel.title: [508] client + server help [508]
channel.description:
ok 1st of all i need a program that can run executabile jar files
2nd i want to have my client and server *without the .java files to stop leeching* together just like the [b]2speced[/b] client
if you need to know what kind of thingy 2 speced uses just go to www.2speced.com and download the client and check it out then delete and help me
and one more thing when i convert jar to exe what is the main java class?????????
oh and if you cant help me with the above ^^^ how would i make a program that can execute .jar files useing C ++ or VB
